title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education        Students take in the view of the Canadian River Valley far below from the overlook on the Quarries Trail. NPS Photo   Â    We welcome classes from all over the Texas Panhandle to hike back in time and learn about the key resource that shaped - and was shaped by - early civilizations on the Great Plains.  Call Park Headquarters at 806-857-3151 to discuss field trip options and scheduling with park staff.
